question: Which Indian shooter has bagged gold in the Women's 10m Air Pistol at the ISSF Junior World Rifle/Pistol Championship?
explanation: Pistol shooter Yashaswini Singh Deswal put up a bright performance to bag a gold in the 10m Air Pistol Women in Germany. She bagged the gold in the ISSF Junior World Championship which is being held in Germany. She fired 235.9 points to clinch the gold.
